Subject: ADV-2024-002: Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities in CoSoSys Endpoint Protector
Description:
Hello!
We are using "Cososys"/Netwrix Endpoint Protector in our company (Barmherzige Brüder Österreich) and need to know if there are already any hotfixes regarding the most recent Vulnerability.
We are currently using Version 5.9.3.0 on our Servers, with client Version 6.0.1.

Kind regards,
David
